line_1: Beside, it Spues a filthy Froth,
line_2: (Whether thro' Rage or Love, or both)

line_1: Should Airy bestow him a Dash of his Froth:
line_2: Your Friend would be very much mended, in troth,

line_1: Of giggle, fidget, and of froth;
line_2: No butterfly more void of wrath.

line_1: To think such beauty was but froth,
line_2: Yet I confess I'm always loth
